p: S. khuzistanica (NCBI:txid1114304) (Jamzad 1994) plants were supplied from Research farm of Khorraman Pharmaceutical Co., Lorestan, Iran. The plants were grown in natural light conditions (about 450–600 μmol m −2 s −1 and 28–32 °C/18–24 °C day/night) in a greenhouse at Bu-Ali Sina University, Hamedan, Iran. Plants were watered as required and fertilised every month.
